name: Kauã Vitório da Silva Lima
description:
Hey! My name is Kauã Vitorio Da Silva Lima, and I am a {age} years old technology enthusiast. I've been working as a backend developer for over 3 years, which has allowed me to dive deep into creating and optimizing systems and applications. Currently, I am pursuing a degree in Computer Science, aiming to expand my knowledge and enhance my skills.

One of my greatest achievements so far has been founding Uspery, where I serve as the Global CEO. Through this experience, I have the incredible opportunity to lead a talented and dedicated team as we work together to provide technological solutions for individuals and businesses in need of tech-related assistance. Our goal at Uspery is to simplify and cater to the technological needs of our clients, delivering innovation and efficiency.

name: Yuri Dantas Godinho
description: Hello! My name is Yuri Dantas, I'm {age} years old, I live in Goiânia-GO and I'm CEO and Graphic Designer at Uspery. I have a background in graphic design and video editing. I am currently studying Publicity and Propaganda.
